scripts.clean-upgrade: npm-check-updates -u && npm run clean-install && npm run dep-list-installed-0
scripts.install-chromedriver: wget -qO- $npm_package_config_chromedriver_dl_url | bsdtar -xpf- -C libs/ && chmod u+x libs/chromedriver
scripts.clean-install: npm run preinstall && rimraf $npm_package_config_target_dir/* && rimraf node_modules/* && npm install && npm run apply-patches && npm run dep-list-installed-0 && npm run make-projstruct && npm run install-chromedriver
scripts.test-in-bg: nohup npm run test -- -R xunit-file </dev/null 2>&1 | tee $npm_package_config_mocha_out_file
